name: Laguna Pool Deck Plan – 8x16 Deck with 8ft Pool Cutout
open_features: 8 ft circular pool cutout (pool structure designed separately by others)
6×6 posts (SP No.2) on 18×18×12 in concrete footings
Deck beams: (2) 2×8 SP No.2 (Beam 1); (2) 2×8 SP No.2 (Beam 2); (1) 2×8 SP No.2 (Beam 3)
Joists: 2×4 SP No.2 @ 12 in O.C. with Simpson H1A ties
2×12 stair stringers @ 12 in O.C.; stair footing 24×48×4 in
Railing: 4×4 posts @ 4 ft O.C.; 2×4 top/bottom rails; 2×2 pickets ≤4 in gap
Decking: 2×6 composite decking; 1/8 in gap after drying
safety_note: This plan illustrates only the deck framing around a pool cutout. The pool itself, electrical bonding, fencing, alarms, and code safety measures must be provided by licensed contractors per local jurisdiction.
